description.en:
Sonic is the first SVM chain to launch on Solana, for games and applications. It is powered by Sonic HyperGrid, a framework for orchestrating optimistic Solana rollups. Sonic is the home of SonicX, industryâ€™s first Web3 TikTok App Layer - designed to onboard the next billion users.

Vision:

We designed Sonic to be the brewing ground for  a world of high-performance decentralized gaming, creating a distinction from the traditional trading experience of in-game assets.
